id.description: Meeting ID - also known as the meeting number.

uuid.description: Unique Meeting ID. Each meeting instance will generate its own meeting UUID.

host_id.description: ID of the user who is set as the host of the meeting.

type.description:
Meeting Types:
`1` - Instant Meeting
`2` - Scheduled Meeting
`3` - Recurring Meeting with no fixed time.
`8` - Recurring Meeting with a fixed time.

timezone.description: Timezone to format the meeting start time.

password.description: Password used to join the meeting.

h323_password.description: Password to join the meeting from H323 device.

pstn_password.description: PSTN password to join the meeting.

issues.description: Issues that occurred during the meeting.

email.description: Email address associated with the Zoom Room.

issue.description:
Issues that occurred during the meeting. The value of the `issue` field could be one of the following:
* `Room Controller disconnected`
* `Room Controller connected` * `Selected camera has disconnected` * `Selected camera is reconnected` * `Selected microphone has disconnected` * `Selected microphone is reconnected` * `Selected speaker has disconnected` * `Selected speaker is reconnected` * `Zoom room is offline` * `Zoom room is online` * `No camera` * `No microphone` * `High CPU usage is detected` * `Low bandwidth network is detected` * `{name} battery is low` * `{name} battery is normal` * `{name} disconnected` * `{name} connected` * `{name} is not charging` Possible values for {name}:
* Zoom Rooms Computer * Controller * Scheduling Display

join_url.description: The url to join the meeting.
